reviewText: good deal for the price. I don't know what else to write about this.  It's okay is all I have to say.they loved it.
Title: Love Train: The Sound Of Philadelphia - Live in Concert

reviewText: The Ice Man knows his stuff.  I could just sit back and watch this over and over again.  This is when music was really music,
Title: Love Train: The Sound Of Philadelphia - Live in Concert

reviewText: I really love this DVD. The quality was excellent! After watching the DVD several times I started to have problems with the DVD. When I contacted the seller, the DVD was replaced. The service was prompt and courteous.
summary: Love Train: The Sound of Philadelphia
Title: Love Train: The Sound Of Philadelphia - Live in Concert

reviewText: If you like that Philly Sound, then this is the one for you. Great artist like Jerry Butler, OJays, Three Degrees, and many more. I enjoyed this very much.
summary: Love Train : The Sound of Philadelphia
Title: Love Train: The Sound Of Philadelphia - Live in Concert

reviewText: I buy al lot of "american" dvd's because in Europe these dvd's are not for sale. So everytime it's a bit of a surprise what you get. This dvd is amazing. The Sound and the performances of the O'Jays and Harold melvin make this dvd sparkling and takes you back to the seventies. My wish is to see those groups for once in my life. I hope they will come to Europe one of thes days!!!Dont forget the bonus section with the full version of TSOP!!!! Dance across the room
summary: What can I say ? : Phillysound rules!!
Title: Love Train: The Sound Of Philadelphia - Live in Concert

reviewText: They reall should include a list of the acts live here and where is this coming from what venue.
summary: Can someone give aq lineup here of all the acts on this in concert Before I buy
